update.description:
I added the world file (ffdb75c), so to test,

  - download luke hand model from deka, copy `luke_hand_description` into `~/.gazebo/models/`
  - run `gazebo --verbose worlds/luke_hand.world`

Changes/Updates:

* add arm sensor offset sdf parsing.
* add a torque filter.
* add joint clutching
* updates to transmission, misc fixes.
* adding poisson's ratio and elastic modulus
* restrict spheres to 1 single contact
* update model
* update contact properties
* enable physics test, setup a grasp in test. adding a pinch test
* fix index ab-ad for cylindrical grasp
* rename haptixJoints to simJoints, better matches what they are.
    * added clutch limit pinching mechanism.
    * add referenceJoint for gearboxes.
    * add JointHelper::GetRealJoint to access gazebo joint.
    * added differential transmission.
    * added thread_position_correction for performance.
    * add joint spring implementation.
    * refactor hand control update.
update.title: update transmission, add clutch.

content.raw: more fixes for motor limits, missed fake joint motor limit calculation (f96ee53). All tests pass now.
content.html: more fixes for motor limits, missed fake joint motor limit calculation (f96ee53). All tests pass now.

content.raw: `<self_collide>` and `cfm`, `erp` warnings are harmless.  Spring related warnings should go away when sdformat is in sdf3 branch with [latest merged pr](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/242/add-spring-pass-through-for-sdf3/diff)
content.html: <self_collide> and cfm, erp warnings are harmless. Spring related warnings should go away when sdformat is in sdf3 branch with latest merged pr

content.raw:
I got consistent errors running INTEGRATION_physics:

```
#!c++

/home/caguero/workspace/handsim/test/integration/physics.cc:531: Failure
Expected: (pose.pos.z) > (1.253), actual: 1.25096 vs 1.253
```

content.raw:
Gazebo shows quite a few warnings when parsing the model:

```
#!c++
Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1231] multiple inconsistent <self_collide> exists due to fixed joint reduction overwriting previous value [true] with [false].

Warning [parser_urdf.cc:1231] multiple inconsistent <self_collide> exists due to fixed joint reduction overwriting previous value [false] with [true].
Warning [parser.cc:778] XML Element[cfm], child of element[joint] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[cfm]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
Warning [parser.cc:778] XML Element[erp], child of element[joint] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[erp]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.

Warning [parser.cc:778] XML Element[springReference], child of element[joint] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[springReference]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
Warning [parser.cc:778] XML Element[springStiffness], child of element[joint] not defined in SDF. Ignoring[springStiffness]. You may have an incorrect SDF file, or an sdformat version that doesn't support this element.
```

I believe I have the code with the lasts pull requests merged. Is this normal?

update.description:
I added the world file (ffdb75c), so to test,

  - download luke hand model from deka, copy `luke_hand_description` into `~/.gazebo/models/`
  - run `gazebo --verbose worlds/luke_hand.world`

Changes/Updates:

* add arm sensor offset sdf parsing.
* add a torque filter.
* add joint clutching
* updates to transmission, misc fixes.
* adding poisson's ratio and elastic modulus
* restrict spheres to 1 single contact
* update model
* update contact properties
* enable physics test, setup a grasp in test. adding a pinch test
* fix index ab-ad for cylindrical grasp
* rename haptixJoints to simJoints, better matches what they are.
    * added clutch limit pinching mechanism.
    * add referenceJoint for gearboxes.
    * add JointHelper::GetRealJoint to access gazebo joint.
    * added differential transmission.
    * added thread_position_correction for performance.
    * add joint spring implementation.
    * refactor hand control update.
update.title: update transmission, add clutch.

content.raw: Testing the controller example included in haptix-comm with @hsu . It seems that we have to tweak some of the joint limits.
content.html: Testing the controller example included in haptix-comm with @hsu . It seems that we have to tweak some of the joint limits.

content.raw: Increased the `z` value of the hand pose for avoiding contact with the table in `luke_hand.world`. c75365f
content.html: Increased the z value of the hand pose for avoiding contact with the table in luke_hand.world. c75365f

* enable physics test, setup a grasp in test. adding a pinch test
* fix index ab-ad for cylindrical grasp
* rename haptixJoints to simJoints, better matches what they are.
    * added clutch limit pinching mechanism.
    * add referenceJoint for gearboxes.
    * add JointHelper::GetRealJoint to access gazebo joint.
    * added differential transmission.
    * added thread_position_correction for performance.
    * add joint spring implementation.
    * refactor hand control update.
update.title: update transmission, add clutch.

content.raw:
yes.

p.s. I am not particularly proud of the existing transmission, it needs to be re-written.  Current version is tailored for the MPL model with poor documentation (see issue #60).  I would like to generalize this transmission approach, but that'll have to wait till after we push out this next release.
content.html:
yes.

p.s. I am not particularly proud of the existing transmission, it needs to be re-written. Current version is tailored for the MPL model with poor documentation (see issue #60). I would like to generalize this transmission approach, but that'll have to wait till after we push out this next release.

update.description:
* add arm sensor offset sdf parsing.
* add a torque filter.
* add joint clutching
* updates to transmission, misc fixes.
* adding poisson's ratio and elastic modulus
* restrict spheres to 1 single contact
* update model
* update contact properties
* enable physics test, setup a grasp in test. adding a pinch test
* fix index ab-ad for cylindrical grasp
* rename haptixJoints to simJoints, better matches what they are.
    * added clutch limit pinching mechanism.
    * add referenceJoint for gearboxes.
    * add JointHelper::GetRealJoint to access gazebo joint.
    * added differential transmission.
    * added thread_position_correction for performance.
    * add joint spring implementation.
    * refactor hand control update.
